Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the amount of money homeowners in Brookhaven save on property taxes compared to owners of the same-value homes in unincorporated DeKalb County.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that Brookhaven homeowners pay hundreds of dollars less in property taxes compared to owners in unincorporated DeKalb County.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the property values and tax rates in Brookhaven and unincorporated DeKalb County are directly comparable, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the difference in property taxes between Brookhaven and unincorporated DeKalb County, such as differences in services provided or other factors not mentioned in the claim.
